author: The Film Theorists
description:
*📽️ Subscribe if you support real artists. ►* https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

We need to talk about AI. Artificial intelligence is becoming more widespread as it’s now being used in all forms of media. In today’s video, we will be having a serious discussion about the state of AI in 2025 and how this will affect all of us moving forward.
